# Government Tender Notice

**Reference:** cb-8509-56003599 - Solicitation: 202400144

## Tender Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified bidders to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Construction of Training Compounds. The RCMP requires three (3) identical Scenario-Based Training Compounds with multiple two-level self-supporting containers to be set up on the Technical and Protective Operations Facility (TPOF) Campus.

## Proposal Submission

Submissions must be received electronically and written in either official language of Canada (English or French).

## Proposal Description

* Proposal summary: The RCMP requires training compounds with identical structures to meet operational needs for the National Chemical, Biological, Radiological, Nuclear Explosives (CBRNE) Response Team.
* Sessions atau meetings will be held in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.
* Training  (explication) will be conducted at the TPOF Campus.

## Selection Criteria

Submissions will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical Quality and Performance
* Pricing
* All attestations or certifications applicable to the proposal

## Notice and Attachments

The notice and attachments can be accessed electronically:

* [Attachment 1 in English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8509/202400144-rcmp-itt-english-final.pdf)
* [Attachment 2 in French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8509/202400144-grc-is-francais_0.pdf)
